hero.title: RoomTech
hero.subtitle: Hambalye aad ku kalsoon tahay ee adeegga IT-ka gurigaaga
hero.description: Adeegga IT-ka professional ah oo toos u ah gurigaaga

about.title: Ku saabsan RoomTech
about.description: RoomTech waxay ka bilaabantaa adeegga IT-ka professional ah. Mustaqbalka, waxaan sidoo kale bixin doonaa adeegyada full-stack iyo adeegyada teknoolojiga kale.

feature1.title: Adeegga guriga
feature1.description: Teknisheenkayagu wuxuu toos u yimaadaa gurigaaga, ma u baahnid inaad safartid.

feature2.title: Qiimaha la wada hadli karo
feature2.description: Qiimooyin dabacsan oo u habboon baahidaada.

feature3.title: Macmiilada daacadda ah
feature3.description: Qiimo dhimis gaar ah macmiiladeena joogtada ah.

maintenance.title: Dayactirka IT-ka
maintenance.description: Hagaajin, xallinta dhibaatooyinka iyo dayactirka qalabkaaga IT-ka gurigaaga.

fullstack.title: Horumarka Full-Stack
fullstack.description: Abuurista codsiyada internetka oo dhamaystiran, frontend iyo backend.

other.title: Adeegyada teknoolojiga kale
other.description: Noocyo badan oo adeegyada teknoolojiga ah si aad u buuxiso baahidaada dhammaan.

news.title: Warbixinada
news.subtitle: Baro bixinta iyo adeegyadeena cusub
news.noNews: Ma jiro warbixin cusub hadda. Soo noqo dhowaan!

blog.title: Warbixinada & Taloyin
blog.subtitle: Ogow heerarka ugu dambeeya ee teknoolojiga
blog.noPosts: Ma jiro maqaal hadda. Soo noqo dhowaan!

contact.title: Nala soo xiriir
contact.subtitle: Nala soo xiriir su'aalo ama codsi kasta

form.name: Magaca
form.success: Fariinta si guul leh ayaa loo diray!
form.error: Qalad ayaa dhacay. Fadlan isku day mar kale.

footer.rights: Xuquuqda oo dhan waa la hayaa
